Package pulpcore.image

Provides classes for images, fonts, and graphic rendering.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnimatedImage An AnimatedImage is a CoreImage that contains multiple frames of animation.
BlendMode An enumeration of blend modes.
Colors The Colors class provides convenience methods to create packed, 32-bit ARGB colors.
CoreFont The CoreFont class is a image-based font used for drawing text.
CoreGraphics Graphics rendering routines onto a CoreImage surface.
CoreImage The CoreImage class contains raster data and provides methods for creating transformed copies of the image.
PNGWriter Converts a CoreImage to the PNG file format.
 

Package pulpcore.image Description

Provides classes for images, fonts, and graphic rendering.
